name: alp
description: personal exploration and framework for node and browser
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (https://christophe.hurpeau.com)

scripts.build: lerna run --stream build && yarn run build:definitions
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:prettier && yarn run lint:eslint
scripts.preversion: yarn run lint:prettier && yarn run lint:eslint --since && yarn run build && repository-check-dirty
scripts.release: cross-env GH_TOKEN=$POB_GITHUB_TOKEN lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --create-release=github -m 'chore: release' && lerna publish from-git
